posts.post_content:
These are T206 HOF players in PSA 4 and one PSA 5:

Baker (Sw Cap)     SOLD
M. Brown (Cubs shirt, Piedmont)  SOLD
F. Clarke (Bat, Piedmont)  SOLD
Joss (Pitching, Sw Cap, PSA 5)  Reduced again to $450  A better Scan is posted at the bottom
Keeler (Port, Piedmont)  SOLD
Speaker (Piedmont)       SOLD
Tinker (Port, Piedmont)  SOLD
Walsh (Port, Piedmont)  SOLD

Prices include shipping. All prices assume payment by a no fee method. Email to [url]ronrice@hotmail.com[/url].

Those are great looking cards! I wish you had a Speaker in the PSA 1.5-2.5 range for my personal collection. I don’t have the budget go after a PSA 4 Speaker at the moment. Thanks for sharing! 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

i'll take tinker and walsh

PM and email coming
Here are some better scans on the Speaker card for $950 and the Joss card for $460.  These are great cards with no creases or wrinkles.
I'll take the speaker,  email coming
